author: James Van Straten, AI Boost
title: Bhutan Possibly Readies $15M Bitcoin Sale as Holdings Near $1.3B
description: State-run wallets remain active while investors weigh potential sell pressure amid bitcoin price consolidation.
content: The Royal Government of Bhutan transferred 137.245 bitcoin worth about $14.77 million to crypto exchange Binance on June 30, according to blockchain data from Arkham Intelligence. This fresh transact… [+999 chars]
